name: demonstrativeness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the action of showing your feelings or behaving in a way that shows your love: He put out a hand with uncharacteristic demonstrativeness and touched her cheek. His lack of demonstrativeness makes him unusual in his emotional, dramatic family. See
demonstrative
More examplesFewer examplesThe study rated mothers on the amount of demonstrativeness exhibited.Some people are raised in homes where physical demonstrativeness is non-existent.Children, as well as adults, differ in demonstrativeness.
